page.title: 09THE GARAGE AT WALL
page.content:
{Worth Â£40,000}and covering one acre, {sells 600 gallons}of petrol per week .
It is staffed by one full time and one part time man . It sells sweets, cigarettes, oil, newspapers and does repairs . It deals whith all types of{cars {and lorries}and has all the{tools}you could think of . Parts are ordered from three different companies .
The garage opens at{8_30 a.m.}and closes at{7p.m.}. Overheads cost{Â£190 per week. The garage deals with one or two accidents per week . The present owner has had it for 17 years .
{Cost of petrol 4* 203,7p per gallon {2* 198,7p per gallon .}
